ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest1.des: A &bNovice Spellbook&r is a great tool for any adventurer. While it only contains basic &dSpell Glyphs&r initially, as you unlock more, you'll be able to combine these &dGlyphs&r to make some very interesting &dspells&r.

- Press "&5C&r" to open the menu to craft your spells (this also contains the &6Spellbook Customization menu&r as well as &6Ars Nouveau&r documentation). &eDon't forget to name your newly crafted spell!&r
Each &dSpell&r needs a &dForm&r (first &bSpell Glyph&r) and an &dEffect&r. &dEffects&r can be augmented by &dAugments&r (place to the left of the Effect).
For more detail, refer to the &6Ars Nouveau Documentation&r contained within each &bSpell Book&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest10.de: &bMagebloom Seeds&r, obtained through the &bEnchanting Apparatus&r, produce &bMagebloom Fiber&r which can be made into various &dMagical Armors&r.

Each &dArmor&r starts off at Tier 1. Upgrade to Tier 2 with two &bBlaze Rods&r in an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r, and Tier 3 with two &bEnder Pearls&r and one &bChorus Fruit&r in an &bEnchanting Apparatus&r. Each upgrade increases the amount of &dMana Regen&r and the number of &bAugmenting Threads&r an &dArmor&r can hold.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest11.de: Provides the least armor but supports the strongest &dAugmentation Threads&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest12.de: Provides more armor than the &dSorcerer's set&r and supports stronger &dAugmentation Threads&r than the &dBattlemage's set&r, but weaker threads than the &dSorcerer's&r and less armor than the &dBattlemage's&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest13.de: Provides the most Armor but supports the least powerful &dAugmentation Threads&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest13.su: Best Armor but least powerful Threads!
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest14.de: &dMage Armor&r can be enhanced through &dMagical Threads&r. Each Armor has a level associated with it, and the strength of the applied &dThread's effect&r will be based on that level.
See the &eWorn Notebook - Magical Armor&r for more info.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest15.de: &bMycelial Sourcelinks&r generate &dSource&r when fueled with food on &bArcane Pedestals&r, &bArcane Platforms&r, or &bdropped nearby&r. Generates more &dSource&r if the food is a &dSource&r producing food.
Slowly converts the ground below it into &bMycelium&r and eventually causes &bMushrooms&r to grow.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest16.de: The &bVolcanic Sourcelink&r burns nearby fuel items (whether they be on &bArcane Pedestals&r, &bArcane Platforms&r, or are &bdropped items&r) to generate &dSource&r.
Turns nearby &bStone&r into &bMagma Blocks&r and eventually into &bLava&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest17.de: The &bVitalic Sourcelink&r generates &dSource&r whenever animals are bred near it or mobs are killed near it.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest17.su: Breed or Kill Mobs for Source!
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest18.de: Absorbs &bPotions&r from nearby &bPotion Jars&r to generate &dSource&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest2.des: The &bImbuement Chamber&r absorbs passive &dSource&r from the environment to enhance the magical properties of various items.

One in particular, &bLapis Lazuli&r, act as a great conduit for source. By placing &bLapis Lazuli&r within an &bImbuement Chamber&r, &bSource Gems&r can be made. &bSource Gems&r are a crucial part of many magical tools.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest20.de: &bSplitters&r can input and output to multiple &bSource Jars&r.
&bCollectors&r automatically take &dSource&r from nearby &bSource Jars&r in a 5 block radius.
&bDepositers&r can automatically deposit &dSource&r into &bSource Jars&r within a 5 block radius.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest21.de: &bWarpers&r act the same way as &bSplitters&r but can go over infinite blocks. Beyond 30 blocks, there is a chance for &dSource&r loss.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest22.de: The &bRitual Brazier&r allows a mage to conduct various Rituals. Rituals can be modified by throwing in certain items.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest23.de: &bImbuement Chambers&r and &bEnchanting Apparatus&r can use nearby items to influence what they produce. &bArcane Pedestals&r act as a way to both display items and provide items to modify the properties of &dImbuing&r and &dEnchanting Rituals&r.
They need to be within 3 blocks of the &bImbuement Chamber&r or the &bEnchantment Apparatus&r to have effect.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest24.de: A Wand of Dominion allows a mage to control their familiars.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest3.des: &dSource&r is required to fuel many arcane machines. However, before you learn how to gather it, you need to create a place to store it.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest30.de: The &bScribe's Table&r allows a Mage to research and &6unlock new Spell Glyphs&r. Interact ('&5Right-Click&r') with the &bScribe's Table&r while holding a &bSpellbook&r to bring up the Menu.

Research new spells by selecting the spell of interest (&5'Select&r&5' button in the bottom right-hand corner&r) and providing the &bScribe's Table&r with the requested items. Use the &bSpell Glyph&r to learn the effect.
A &bNovice Spellbook&r can only use &dTier 1 Glyphs&r. To view all available &dTier 1 Glyphs&r, press the '&5I&r' section in the &bScribe's Table&r.
Each &dGlyph&r unlocked increases your &dSource Pool&r by a little.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest4.des: &bArgonomic Sourcelinks&r generate &dSource&r when nearby crops grow.
&bSource Jars&r must be within 5 blocks of the &bAgronomic Sourcelink&r.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest5.des: An &bEnchanting Apparatus&r allows one to make all sorts of refined magical equipment. Simply put in the item you are modifying, surround the Apparatus with the appropriate items on the surrounding &bArcane Pedestals&r, and supply enough &dSource&r.
&bEnchanting Apparatus&r can also be used to create the specific &bEnchanted Books&r that you want. Just provide the right catalysts.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest6.des: Item transport + Autoharvest source berries. Can be dyed
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest7.des: A &bMage's Spellbook&r allows one to use &dTier 2 Glyphs&r in their spell creation.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest8.des: An &bArchmage's Spellbook&r allows one to use the highest tier of &dGlyph&r, the &dTier 3 Glyphs&r, in their spell creation.
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest9.des: &dSource&r powers everything in this world, though it takes many forms. &bSource Gems&r with the right materials augmenting an &dImbuement Ritual&r allow a mage to isolate and capture essences related to certain natural phenomena.

Rumor has it that originally an &5Eye of Ender&r was used as the foundation for all of &dMagic&r as we know it. Perhaps some of that power still lingers among the &dMagical Essences&r we see here today...
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.quest9.sub: Create the Essences of the World!
ftbquests.chapter.ars_nouveau.title: Ars Nouveau
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quest1.sub: Obtain every unique weapon. Good luck...
ftbquests.chapter.collections.quest10.su: Harness the power of mobs for powerful weapons
ftbquests.chapter.collections.title: Collections
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest1.descript: There are a lot of things you can do with &bAndesite&r. &eCreate&r your first &bAndesite Casings&r to get the tools needed to build all sorts of fancy machines.
&6Create an Andesite Casing by applying some Andesite Alloy to a Stripped Log.&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest1.subtitle: Start here to learn Create!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest1.title: Beginnings of Create!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest10.descrip: If you place water, lava, or a campfire in front of this baby, it will cause the air to be filled with &ointeresting&r particles which can be used to process items! It also moves entities! Now you can have the air conditioning of your dreams...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest10.subtitl: Don't stick your finger between the slats!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest10.title: I'm such a fan!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest11.descrip: Chopping down trees with your axe can get really boring really quickly. A saw can be used to fell it all at once! Just point the spinny edge at the bottom log and the entire thing will fall down! It can also be used for processing.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest11.subtitl: There's a buzzsaw in every game now isn't there?
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest11.title: Timbeeer!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest12.descrip: Rotation is not only useful for processing things, it's also useful for making things look nice! You can make large things rotate to add spice to your build, or even rotate something slightly and keep it locked at that rotation!
&6Edit the placement mode of a mechanical bearing by looking at the side of it.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest12.title: *Aesthetics :D*
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest13.descrip: &bCopper&r is not only useful for decoration, it can also be used to make methods of transporting fluids! When a &bBucket&r won't cut it, &bpipes&r can transport larger amounts of liquid.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest13.title: Manipulating Fluids
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest14.descrip: There's much that can be done with the Create mod, however in order to do anything you first need some form of power! All contraptions in the Create mod are powered by &erotational forces&r, and while there are indeed more complex methods of power generation, every good engineer starts off with either &bwind power&r, &9water power&r, or &6manual labor&r!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest15.descrip: There's much more to be seen! Much of Create is under the domain of pure precision, but quite a bit of it is supceptible to chaos. However you want to play it is completely up to you!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest15.subtitl: More and more and more accurate...
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest15.title: Precision!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest16.descrip: Feeling lost? Most machines from the create mod can be pondered by holding &ew&r while hovering over it in the inventory. Try it out if you don't fully understand how to use it!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest2.descript: Engineers Goggles allow you to see the &aStress Units&r of the various contraptions you build.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest2.subtitle: Determine Stress Units of your builds!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest2.title: I see everything now
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3.descript: Wrenches allow you to easily rotate your contraptions. They are also used to pick up contraptions (&6Shift + Right Click&r).
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3.subtitle: Easily rotate and move your builds!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest3.title: Comically large Wrench
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4.descript: Crush your first materials! You can operate the &bMechanical Press&r with your &bHand Crank&r, though you'll have to put your back into it.
Alternatively, you can hook it up to some &bWaterwheels&r or &bSails&r and harness the rotational force those generate to move the Press for you.
&ePlace the item being pressed below the Mechanical Press to process it.&r Use the Ponder Mechanic in JEI for more details (hover over the item and press "W")
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4.subtitle: Press Iron to obtain your first Iron Sheets!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest4.title: Pressing Materials
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest5.descript: Water is never to be underestimated. It erodes away canyons, shapes cliffsides, and washes away everything in terrifying floods. However, in moderation, it can be harnessed for one's own benifit. &9Waterwheels&r are the perfect example of how a stream of water can be transformed into rotational force.

&6Place a stream of water flowing through the blades of a waterwheel to spin it. It doesn't matter how many faces of the waterwheel is being touched by the flowing water, just one face is enough to fully power the waterwheel.&r
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest5.subtitle: Sploosh
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest5.title: Harnessing the rivers
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6.descript: Wind is everywhere. It is an ever present companion, whether you are sailing the seas, in a valley, or at the top of a mountain. It blows through forests and ruffles plains with it's jovial touch. It is constantly moving, and has no qualms blowing over whatever it wishes. With a bit of ingenuity, it is possible to fashion &bblades&r that catch it, and turns in response to it's constant playing.
&6Use any kind of wool attatched to a windmill bearing to harness the wind! It does have to be large enought to actually catch it though.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6.subtitle: Woosh
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest6.title: Air power
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7.descript: If you just need a bit of rotation, you can provide it yourself! A &6handcrank&r is certainy very cheap, but it takes your energy to generate rotation. Go ahead and try it, but don't tire yourself out!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7.subtitle: Oh my aching back!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest7.title: Blood, sweat, and tears
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8.descript: Sometimes just a regular crafting table doesn't cut it. You need something bigger and more mechanical! Now presenting the mechanical crafter 9000! When you chain multiple of these machines together, you can automate the crafting of items or even make things you could never make before using just the regular crafting table!

&8&o&kThe Mechanical Villager&r &8&oIndustries is not liable in any way, shape, or form for any misuse, malpractice, workplace injuries, or random speaking of french that may arise from using this product. Use at your own risk!
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8.subtitle: More and more complex machines.
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest8.title: Mechanical Crafting
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest9.descript: Sometimes, you just want to crush things, you know? Using two crushing wheels, you are able to process things into more particulate versions of themselves. Go ahead and throw anything you want into it! We're not liable. :)
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest9.subtitle: Scrunch
ftbquests.chapter.create.quest9.title: Crushing Wheel
ftbquests.chapter.create.title: Create
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest1.descr: A &bHepheastus Forge&r is a tool of incredible power. Ponder by holding W on the Hepheastus Forge item to see how to create it.
To use its power, you need to feed it with &6Souls&r, &6Blood&r, &6Experience&r, and &6Aureal&r essence. Lists of what items work are on the last few pages.
You can use it to create &dRunic Weapons&r, &dItem Modifiers&r, and even some &dSecret Weapons&r.

While it is only &dTier 1&r initially, you can upgrade it to unlock more recipes and increase storage. Each upgrade will also give you an additional slot for an &6Enhancer&r. These help reduce the costs of essences and unlock new recipes.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest1.title: The Hephaestus Forge
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest10.desc: The &dAlluring&r ritual is a rather simple ritual that &dlures&r all &epassive mobs&r in a large radius towards the &bBrazier&r the ritual is initaited in. Check &dEMI&r for instructions.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest11.desc: The &dRepeling&r ritual is another simple ritual that &drepels&r all &ehostile creatures&r in a large radius, pushing away from the &bBrazier&r the ritual is initaited in. Check &dEMI&r for instructions.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest12.desc: The &dDeceit&r ritual is a simple ritual that &nresets any negative standing&r you have with &bvillagers.&r In your journey through &4The Dark Arts&r- one may have to do some things they're not too proud of- but it'll be forgiven with this simple trick.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest13.desc: The &dRitual of Daylight&r and the &dRitual of Moonlight&r are 2 rituals that can be used to change the time of day- to &eDay&r and &1Night&r respectively.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest13.subt: Let there be Day! and Night!
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest14.desc: The &dRitual of Purifying&r is a simple ritual that can be used to maximize efficiency of &aVillager Curing.&r It cures ALL &6zombie villagers&r in a radius around the &bBrazier&r, while also restoring &6Zombified Piglins and Hoglins&r.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest15.desc: The &dSanguine Rituals&r are a series of &dRituals&r that grant the caster with 2 useful items; the &cSanguine Amulet&r and the &cSword of Sapping.&r Both of these rituals require living creatures around the &bBrazier&r as sacrifice- which will be &4consumed&r during the ritual.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest16.desc: The &dRecharging Rituals&r are used to charge the &6Soulfire and Bonechill wands&r, using &6Blaze Powder and Snowballs&r respectively. To charge, simply perform the appropriate ritual with your &6Wand&r on the &bNecrotic Focus.&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest17.desc: The &dCapturing Ritual&r is a unique ritual that captures any &6Undead Creatures&r around the &bBrazier&r &e(that are weakened to least a third of their total health)&r and places them in the &6Summoning Staff&r placed in the &bNecrotic Focus. &r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest18.desc: You may assemble your own &dPumpkin Spirit&r similiarly to building a snow golem. Place 2 &6dark oak logs&r, then a &6hay bale&r on top, and lastly a &6pumpkin&r on top of that. Bring it to life by right clicking on the pumpkin with an &6Ethereal Spirit!&r
&4Who knows what using a transmuting elixir on the spirit may bring to life...&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest18.subt: Build your very own Pumpkin Spirit!
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest2.descr: The &bHepheastus Forge&r has up to 4 slots for &6Enhancers&r. They are found in structures throughout the world. Obtain all of them to unlock the full potential of the forge.
On the next page is a list of what each &6Enhancer&r does.
-&bUnholy Symbol&r: Allows for the creation of &dCelestial&r Items.
-&bHoly Symbol&r: Allows for the creation of &dCursed&r Items.
-&bRunic Tablet&r: Allows for the creation of &dRunic&r Items.
-&bElementarium&r: Allows for the creation of &dElemental&r Items.
-&bCrescent Moon&r: Greatly reduces &6Aureal&r usage depending on the time of day.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest2.title: Forge Enhancers
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest3.descr: You can create powerful &dItem Modifiers&r using the &bHepheastus Forge&r.
These can be applied to tools in a smithing table with an &bItem Modifier Upgrade Template&r.
A list of what each &dItem Modifier&r does is on the following page.
-&bSmelter Prism&r: Used on pickaxes. Gives it the ability to &dAuto-Smelt&r blocks it mines.
-&bSea Prism&r: Used on helmets. While worn grants &dregeneration&r and &dfaster mining&r while underwater.
-&bTerrastomp Prism&r: Used on tools that break blocks. Gives it the ability to &dvein-mine&r in a &d3x3&r area.
-&bWhirlwind Prism&r: Currently not implemented. You can place it to grant yourself &dslow-falling&r and propel yourself upwards.
-&bEternal Stella&r: Makes a tool or armor piece &dIndestrucible&r. It no longer has a durability bar.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest3.title: Item Modifiers
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest4.descr: The &bMystical Dagger&r allows you to fill a &bTest Tube&r with &4blood&r by killing mobs.
This can be used to fuel the &6Hephaestus Forge.&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest5.descr: &e&oSo? You think you have what it takes to be a Witch? We shall see.&r&r

To start your journey into Witchcraft you must obtain the &bBook of Shadows&r. It is your trusty book of &5the dark arts&r and will guide you through your journey. Place it on an &bAltar&r to unlock its power.
Also, every good Witch needs their very own &bMixing Cauldron&r.
&o&5Once you have these tools, your true test will begin.&r&r
Note: The Book of Shadows has been modified for this pack to have updated recipes so you can trust it!
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest5.title: Witchy Business
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest6.descr: If you wear a &bWitch's hat&r you can &6haggle&r with Witches. Bring them the items they ask for and you will be rewarded.
&o&5If you're lucky, you may even be able to obtain the Witch's Eye.&r&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest6.title: Witch Haggling
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest7.descr: Dark Rituals are a powerful alternative to Rituals, performed primarily using a &bBrazier&r surrounded by &bStone Hands&r and a &bNecrotic Focus&r.
&eItems can be placed in each of these receptacles to perform a number of different unique functions.&r
You can view the list of performable Rituals by checking the uses for the &bBrazier&r in &6EMI.&r
The item placed in the centre is placed in the &bbrazier&r, those surrounding it in &bstone hands&r and those surrounding it with a unique border is the &bnecrotic focus.&r
Once all items are in place, ignite the &bBrazier&r with a &6Flint and Steel&r to initiate the rirtual.
&eWhere the surrounding receptacles and the items contained inside of them are placed is not specific.&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest7.subti: Understand the Basics of Dark Rituals
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest7.title: The Dark Rituals
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest8.descr: The Crystallization Ritual is performed by placing &6Arcane Bonemeal&r in a &bBrazier&r and &6Redstone&r in 2 surrounding &bStone Hands&r.
This ritual converts all nearby &6Undead Creatures&r into &6Soul Shards,&r a very useful crafting component in &4The Dark Arts&r.
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest8.title: Crystallization Ritual
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest9.descr: The &dLesser Summoing&r rituals are a series of rituals using &6Charcoal&r in a &bBrazier&r surroung by&6 various utility items&r in &bStone Hands&r and the &bNecrotic Focus.&r
This ritual summons various &6Undead Creatures&r atop the &bbrazier&r, with each combination summoning a different type. Use &dEMI&r to see the specifics of each &4Ritual Recipe.&r
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.quest9.title: Lesser Summoning Rituals
ftbquests.chapter.dark_arts.title: The Dark Arts
Trade &bSource Gems&r for &bPathfinder Quills&r to locate different biomes!
ftbquests.chapter.explorers_maps.title: Explorers Maps
ftbquests.chapter.pack_introduction.ques: &5Integrated Minecraft &6is a modpack centered around integrating various popular mods together for a cohesive experience.&r This questbook is set up to help guide you through some of the larger mods as well as to point you towards things of interest. Keep reading for more info!

You'll also notice that the sections outside of this one are written with some lore. Feel free to delve into it, but if not your cup of tea, the &6Subtitles&r should give you a quick overview of each section.
Start here!
Welcome to Integrated Minecraft!

Some mobs have information attached to their Spawn Eggs. These usually are mobs with more complicated mechanics. Additional information and lore for many mobs can be found through the &6Animal Dictionary&r.
&nExample:&r
Gorilla
Elephant
Bee
Search Mobs
You can also search for specific mods with &a"@"&r. For instance, try &a"@endrem"&r. If you are enjoying items from a specific mod, try looking it up to see what else it has to offer!
&nExamples: &r
@AlexsMobs
@Spelunkery
@Create
Search by Mod ID
The pathway to the &5End&r has been completely reworked through &e"End Remastered"&r. View it under "&aTo the End of the Beginning&r"!
Eyes of Ender Tweaks

As you begin your first adventure, you stumble upon a worn, tattered book labeled 「Adventuring for Newbies!!!!」.  &a"What an insane coincidence"&r, you think. Intrigued, you open it up, and surprisingly, a crude looking face and words start appearing on the page.
「Oh. Hmm. I can see you're trying to speak but I can't actually hear you. Heck, it's already taking an immense amount of power to manifest like this. Hence these cruddy faces.」&e(>_<)&r
「But, decision time. Help me or abandon me.」
「Just the person I was expecting. Say, would you like to slay a Dragon?」&eヽ(•‿•)ノ&r
Flabbergasted, you almost drop the book. But you can't.
「How. Rude. But hey, beggers can't be choosers, I guess.」&e┐(￣ヘ￣)┌&r
You try to close the book. But you can't.
「Cmon, just hear me out. Then I'll let you go.」&e╥﹏╥&r

「Thanks. Help me achieve my goals and I'll help you achieve yours. &aMy name is Ana, a Mage&r. I was sealed in this book, but once I'm out, I'll grant you all the riches you could ever want. Heck, I can even manifest a few things from within here for you.」
You try to ask for more details.
Premise of the Lore
Pack Lore Flavoring
Lore Introduction
COMPLETE TO ENABLE LORE (subquests that only give flavor text)
Help?
Abandon?

&e"JEI"&r (short for Just Enough Items) and &e"EMI"&r are the items on the right when you open your inventory. Use them to search items and view their recipes. Here's a couple of tricks!

- Press &d"R"&r over an item, or &dleft-click&r on it, to view its recipe. Some items like Rotten Flesh will display the mob they are dropped by. Some items will have a tab with an &a"I"&r in a circle. Click it to view more information on the item
- Press &d"U"&r over an item, or &dright-click&r on it, to view its uses in various recipes.
Learn to use JEI/EMI to search items!

&bExplorer Maps&r are a core part of the &5Integrated Minecraft&r experience, acting as an expansion of the mapping functionalities provided by the base game. Many of you already know how to use a Map, but here's a quick reference for anyone who's forgotten.

- The top of the map is &6North&r, and travelling in the &6negative Z direction&r takes you North. The red pole of the &bMagnetic Compass&r also points North, so if it is pointing upwards, you are travelling North.
- Left of the map is &6West&r, and travelling in the &6negative X direction&r takes you West. The &bMagentic compass&r will be pointing right.
- Right of the map is &6East&r, and travelling in the &6positive X direction&r takes you East. The &bMagentic compass&r will be pointing left.
- The bottom of the map is &6South&r, and travelling in the &6positive Z direction&r takes you South. The &bMagentic compass&r will be pointing down.
F3 will show the direction you are headed if you ever get confused.
Quick refresher on how Explorer Maps work!
Using Maps
Tips

&e"Regions Unexplored"&r adds many biomes, including some with their own types of &bdirt&r. While there is an option to limit biome generation to only include default dirt, in order to allow for greater customization, this is not enabled by default.
However, to ease inventory management issues, all new dirt types can be converted to vanilla &bdirt&r through the &bCrafting Table&r. Try it out!
Many can also be crafted through custom recipes (mostly involving their respective saplings).
Easy Conversions for Inventory Management!
Dirt Conversions
- The inventory is greatly improved through the &e"Inventorio"&r and &e"Tool Belt"&r mods!
- You now have multiple offhands! This is now called the &bUtility Belt&r. You can scroll through them with a keybind (default &5"Button 4"&r).
- You can now equip a &bTool Belt&r through the curios menu. Press &5"G"&r to access it. You can add more slots to your &bTool Belt&r with &bBelt Pouches&r with an &bAnvil&r.
- There is a new leggings enchantment called &bDeep Pockets&r. Each level adds &6an additional row&r to your inventory. Additionally, the first level adds 4 extra slots to the &bUtility Belt&r.
- The capacity for the &bEnder Chest&r has been doubled.
- An &bInfinity Bow&r no longer requires arrows.
- &bTotems&r activate from the &bUtility Belt&r.
Inventorio
Inventory Tweaks
Since you're here, you probably understand the basics of the &dQuest Book&r. However, in case you are new to this, here's some important things to keep in mind:
- The tab on the left shows all of the &bChapters&r within the &dQuest Book&r.
- &bSome chapters and many quests are initially hidden, until they are trigger by certain items&r. These should pop-up on the right of the screen when trigger.
- One chapter acts as a storage for &dhidden recipes&r, unlocked by finding &7Tattered Books&r.
Learn how the Quest Book works!
&5&nWhat should I do?&r&r

Normal Minecraft stuff :) This pack has tools to help you explore and add a more RPG element, but at the end of the day, its meant as an open ended vanilla expansion. Maybe try getting the Eyes of Ender?
&5&nHow do I craft x?&r&r

Many of the recipe books are intentionally left ambiguous with the intent that players puzzle it out on their own. That said, we know not everyone likes that approach. Thus, each quest book SHOULD trigger a Quest containing the exact recipes.
&5&nCan you add x mod?&r&r

As a general rule of thumb, it's better to have less mods than more, as if we discover any game-breaking bugs, removing mods can break player's worlds. That said, we highly highly encourage you to customize the pack to your wants and needs. To do this, in CurseForge, go to the dots next to &6"Play"&r, hit &6"Profile Options"&r, and click &6"Allow Content Management for this Profile"&r. Most mods should be compatible out of the box. &eALWAYS BACKUP YOUR PACK BEFORE ADDING, REMOVING, OR UPDATING MODS.&r
&5&nI don't like x mod.&r&r

The hard part about this pack is many of the features are so integrated that it's hard to untangle them. That said, many are highly configured (looking at you, Apotheosis...) to smooth some of the rougher corners. I'm willing to help you remove mods if you ask in Discord (besides Ars Nouveau, Create, and a few others. Those are bedrock of the pack unfortunately)

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask on Discord! Craisin or I (hisakid) are usually around to answer questions. I have the Integrated Minecraft channel unmuted so I should see most chats.

&5Integrated Minecraft&r includes a couple of tweaks to Vanilla mechanics. Check them out here!
Vanilla Tweaks!
Vanilla Tweaks

- Villagers have completely reworked trades to integrate the various mods. Higher tiered villagers also have some special rewards. All of these changes were made through &e"Dynamic Villager Trades"&r.
- Villagers now follow players holding &2Emerald Blocks&r, courtesy of &e"Quark"&r.
- Villagers now cycle their trades every day.
- Only &lmax level&r librarians sell &bMending&r, but they are more likely to sell &bMending&r. There may be other ways to obtain it too...
- There are three new villager types through &e"Ice and Fire"&r, &e"Domestication Innovation"&r, and &e"Better Archeology"&r. Search &2#villager_job_site&r to view their job blocks.
Villager Mechanics
- Enchanting has been overhauled through &e"Apotheosis"&r. Upgrade your enchanting set up with higher tier bookshelves to get better results!

- The EXP needed for max-level enchanting (through Apotheosis) has been greatly increased. However, now &670% of your EXP is dropped on death and the EXP scaling between levels has been greatly reduced&r.
- &6Enchantment books found in chests are now limited in level&r to encourage enchanting through the &bEnchanting Table&r. They can still be upgraded in &bAnvils&r (see Anvil tweaks).
Enchantment Tweaks
Enchanting and EXP Tweaks

- &bAnvils&r &6no longer have penalties for prior work&r to reduce the need for EXP grinders and encourage a gradual progression of tool improvement, rather than applying all the enchantments at once.
- &bAnvils&r can now be repaired by right-clicking with &bIron Ingots&r
- Renaming items only needs 1 level of EXP.
All of these changes have been done through &e"Forgery"&r!
Anvil Tweaks
- Combat is improved through the &e"Better Combat"&r mod. Try it for yourself!
- There are multiple new types of weapons. Each has different combat properties, so try several.

- &bShields&r have been reworked through the &e"Shield Expansion"&r mod. &bShields&r are now disabled upon being hit, but if you time your block right when attacked (parry), the cooldown is bypassed and melee attackers are pushed back.
Miscellaneous Tweaks
Combat Tweaks
This pack comes with a lot of keybinds built in. Here are some of key ones:
- &d"I"&r - Inventory Settings Menu (&eInventorio&r).
- &d"Z"&r - Uses a Spyglass in your Inventory (&eSpyglass Improvements&r).
&a&lYou might want to add a keybind to:&r&r
- Switch hotbars (&eQuark&r). Search it at "Hotbar Swapper" under Keybinds.
- Switch utilities (&eInventorio&r). This scrolls through your offhand slot. Search it at "Utility" under Keybinds.
- Enables Rotation Lock (&eQuark&r), allowing for placing blocks only in a certain orientation. Search it at "Rotation Lock".
If you have any questions on how to control something, check the Key Binds!
Some items with specific keybinds (ie. &bQuiver&r, &bMap Atlas&r) have additional information on them in their JEI Information tab.
- &d"B"&r - Open Backpack (&eSophisticated Backpacks&r)
- &d"C"&r - Open Spellbook (&eArs Nouveau&r)
- &d"G"&r - Open Tool Belt (&eTool Belt&r)
- &d"Button 4"&r - Cycles through Utility Belt (&eInventorio&r)
- &d"M"&r - Open Map Atlas (&eMap Atlas&r)
- &d"Y"&r - Crawl (&eForgery&r)
- &d"V"&r - Opens Voice Chat GUI (&eSimple Voice Chat&r).
- &d"U"&r - Mute Microphone (&eSimple Voice Chat&r)
All current keybinds of note!

ftbquests.chapter.rumors.quest10.descrip: As you approach the Redhorn Guild, you hear the rattle of weapons and armor as its inhabitants stare at you through the tower. Once you pull out the &5Note&r, though, everyone settles back down and you are waved inside.
There, you meet an older man, with dark hair and an eyepatch over one eye. Around his neck lies a necklace, holding a slowly blinking red &5Eye&r.

&b"Thank you for making the long journey here. My name is &5Craisin&r&b, and I am the current guildmaster. I often send note out to those who are &6Reputable&r&b and have accomplished many great things on behalf of the &5Guild&r&b."
&b"Now that I've gotten to meet you in person, we can officially register you with the &5Guild&r&b. Just sign this &5Contract&r&b here."
After you sign the &5Contract&r, it is set ablaze by sparkling blue and purple flames.

&b"Perfect! Since some of our &6Quests&r&b require &5Guildmembers&r&b to slay monsters deep in the caves, the &5Contract&r&b acts as a means of verifying the completion of those &6Quests&r&b without requiring the &5Guildmembers&r&b to fork over some of the spoils."

&b"Now that you've registered, you can also turn in the &5Note&r&b at the Counter over there for rewards. I often send &5Reward Notes&r&b to any &6Bounty Board&r&b with a high rate of completion, so if you earn more, you're more than welcome to come back and trade them for more goods."
